[bq="HJSDGCE"]You know, I figured out Doflamingo's DF way before the current arc, during the WhiteBeard War Arc.
It's kinda obvious when he acts like a puppeteer.

Also, Devil Fruits can be anything. That's what makes it exciting. Imagine a Fan Fan Fruit.[/bq]

My brother invented the Box-Box Fruit. You eat it and you become a box man
t[/bq]

Entonces si muero siendo un hombre caja, me convertire en el fantasma de las cajas?
!http://img1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110818003224/dannyelfantasma/es/images/4/45/El_asombroso_fantasma_de_las_cajas.PNG!
